title: David Morse on The Langoliers, The Green Mile, and Hearts in Atlantis (Patreon Clip)
itunes:title: David Morse on The Langoliers, The Green Mile, and Hearts in Atlantis (Patreon Clip)
description:
Here's a preview of our latest Patreon-exclusive interview with veteran actor David Morse, who revisits his roles in The Langoliers, The Green Mile, Hearts in Atlantis, and the audiobook for Revival. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become a member for more exclusive bonus content. Right now, we’re offering 15% off all annual memberships ahead of 2022. So, there’s really no better time than now to join us in The Barrens.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
